item.title: Credits
item.description: Previous productions include Click on a production’s title to be taken to the appropriate gallery page Lighting Designer Aug-19 | She Sells Sea Shells | Scandal and Gallows | dir. Madeleine Skipsey | Iron Belly, Edinburgh Jul-19 – Sept-19 | Tuna | Airlock Theatre | dir. Robbie Taylor Hunt | King’s Head Theatre, London; Old Red Lion Theatre, London May-19 | A Girl, Standing | Back Talk Theatre | dir.
